title: "Continuing acquisition spree, HPE buys infrastructure monitoring startup OpsRamp"
excerpt: "Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. is acquiring OpsRamp Inc., a startup with a platform that helps companies detect and fix malfunctions in their infrastructure. HPE announced the deal today. It marks the fourth acquisition the company has made since the start of the year."
